text: (E ranti) nigba ti A gba adehun lowo yin, A si gbe apata sâ€™oke ori yin, (A so pe:) "E gba ohun ti A fun yin mu daradara. Ki e si teti gboro." Won wi pe: "A gbo (ase), a si yapa (ase)." Won ti ko ife bibo oborogidi omo maalu sinu okan won nipase aigbagbo won. So pe: "Aburu ni ohun ti igbagbo (iborisa) yin n pa yin lase re, ti e ba je onigbagbo ododo
